projects.name: Parking Automation
projects.description: Developed a parking automation system using OpenCV for real-time identification and verification of users. Implemented facial recognition algorithms to match user identities with their driving license photos stored in a database. Generated real-time parking access passes upon successful verification, allowing authorized users seamless entry and exit.
